metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15892 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Varnish Cache before 6.0.4 LTS, and 6.1.x and6.2.x before 6.2.1. An HTTP/1 parsing failure allows a remote attacker totrigger an assert by sending crafted HTTP/1 requests. The assert will causean automatic restart with a clean cache, which makes it a Denial of Serviceattack.

criterions.comment: varnish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
